actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-302.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of House Resolution (H. Res. 251), a resolution amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to increase the amount of outside earned income which a Member may have in 1981, 1982, and 1983, and to increase the amount of the maximum honorarium which a Member may accept.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H. Res. 251 (Outside income of Members).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of House Resolution (H. Res. 251), a resolution amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to increase the amount of outside earned income which a Member may have in 1981, 1982, and 1983, and to increase the amount of the maximum honorarium which a Member may accept.
